```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(base)
library(knitr)
library(rmarkdown)
library(tidyverse)
library(moderndive)
library(broom)
library(nycflights13)

knitr::write_bib(c(.packages(),
                   'base',
                   'knitr',
                   'rmarkdown',
                   'tidyverse',
                   'moderndive',
                   'broom',
                   'nycflights13'), 'bib/packages.bib')
```
